_header: I am sore astoned when I remember me
_description: A verse translation of the Proem and Book 1 of Petrarch’s Secretum — 8-line stanzas (ababbbc)

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
I am soore astoned whan I remembre meHow I entred thys lyff &
                    how I schal oute agayne…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Where Ioye ys euer lastynge Now hens late vs hyeWith the
                    lycens of my lorde We wyll noo more to nyght
BLAdd60577.Attributed Author:
Assit principio Sancta Maria meo ffranciscus Petrarcha (f.
                    8)
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional

                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
